channel.title: No connection found please try using a different world
channel.description: i have download multiple sources and clients i just simply cant log into any of them i have my port forwarding enabled i checked on can u see me .org my cache is in the right place also what i do is i clic krun on source side then click run on client side after i change ips and it jus twont log me in can some one give me advice on what to do to log in please what ever works i will give you a mill on rs better then nothing :)

item.title: No connection found please try using a different world
item.dc:creator: @garion2012 garion2012
item.description:
@garion2012 wrote:

hello how do i get my no=ip to work for my server im brand new to coding and i feel like im doing somethign wrong because i really cant log in no matter what i do my port forwarding is coorect and i have a no-ip account but i dont know how to set it for my server so i can log in please explain to me what i need to do upon downloading a untouched source plus client

i have added 0.0.0.0 to both client server = values this is what i get now when i try to load the client the cache is in users folder i get this error

2nvrp1c.png1440×900
can you please help me out my no-ip is correct i changed the no-ip on the gui file what else do i have to do?

Read full topic

item.title: No connection found please try using a different world
item.dc:creator: @777slots2 777slots2
item.description:
@777slots2 wrote:

garion2012:

i have download multiple sources and clients i just simply cant log into any of them i have my port forwarding enabled i checked on can u see me .org my cache is in the right place also what i do is i clic krun on source side then click run on client side after i change ips and it jus twont log me in can some one give me advice on what to do to log in please what ever works i will give you a mill on rs better then nothing

Well obviously you did something wrong with portforwarding or something else most likely minor and over looked. I’d slowly check over everything and double check it.
